tracks.name: domain
tracks.label: Domain
tracks.tooltip: Specific combination of secondary structures organized into a characteristic three-dimensional structure or fold

tracks.name: region
tracks.label: Region
tracks.tooltip: Regions in multifunctional enzymes or fusion proteins, or characteristics of a region, e.g., protein-protein interactions mediation

tracks.name: motif
tracks.label: Motif
tracks.tooltip: Short conserved sequence motif of biological significance

tracks.name: metal
tracks.label: Metal binding
tracks.tooltip: Binding site for a metal ion

tracks.name: site
tracks.label: Site
tracks.tooltip: Any interesting single amino acid site on the sequence

tracks.name: repeat
tracks.label: Repeat
tracks.tooltip: Repeated sequence motifs or repeated domains within the protein

tracks.name: ca_bind
tracks.label: Calcium binding
tracks.tooltip: Calcium-binding regions, such as the EF-hand motif

tracks.name: dna_bind
tracks.label: DNA binding
tracks.tooltip: DNA-binding domains such as AP2/ERF domain, the ETS domain, the Fork-Head domain, the HMG box and the Myb domain

tracks.name: zn_fing
tracks.label: Zinc finger
tracks.tooltip: Small, functional, independently folded domain that coordinates one or more zinc ions

tracks.name: np_bind
tracks.label: Nucleotide binding
tracks.tooltip: (aka flavin-binding). Region in the protein which binds nucleotide phosphates

tracks.name: binding
tracks.label: Binding site
tracks.tooltip: Binding site for any chemical group (co-enzyme, prosthetic group, etc.)

tracks.name: act_site
tracks.label: Active site
tracks.tooltip: Amino acid(s) directly involved in the activity of an enzyme

tracks.name: signal
tracks.label: Signal peptide
tracks.tooltip: N-terminal signal peptide

tracks.name: chain
tracks.label: Chain
tracks.tooltip: (aka mature region). This describes the extent of a polypeptide chain in the mature protein following processing

tracks.name: transit
tracks.label: Transit peptide
tracks.tooltip: This describes the extent of a transit peptide

tracks.name: init_met
tracks.label: Initiator methionine
tracks.tooltip: This indicates that the initiator methionine is cleaved from the mature protein

tracks.name: propep
tracks.label: Propeptide
tracks.tooltip: Part of a protein that is cleaved during maturation or activation

tracks.name: peptide
tracks.label: Peptide
tracks.tooltip: The position and length of an active peptide in the mature protein

tracks.name: mod_res
tracks.label: Modified residue
tracks.tooltip: Modified residues such as phosphorylation, acetylation, acylation, methylation

tracks.name: carbohyd
tracks.label: Glycosylation
tracks.tooltip: Covalently attached glycan group(s)

tracks.name: disulfid
tracks.label: Disulfide bond
tracks.tooltip: The positions of cysteine residues participating in disulphide bonds

tracks.name: crosslnk
tracks.label: Cross-link
tracks.tooltip: Covalent linkages of various types formed between two proteins or between two parts of the same protein

tracks.name: lipid
tracks.label: Lipidation
tracks.tooltip: Covalently attached lipid group(s)

tracks.name: compbias
tracks.label: Compositional bias
tracks.tooltip: Position of regions of compositional bias within the protein and the particular amino acids that are over-represented within those regions

tracks.name: conflict
tracks.label: Sequence conflict
tracks.tooltip: Sequence discrepancies of unknown origin

tracks.name: non_cons
tracks.label: Non-adjacent residues
tracks.tooltip: Indicates that two residues in a sequence are not consecutive and that there is an undetermined number of unsequenced residues between them

tracks.name: non_ter
tracks.label: Non-terminal residue
tracks.tooltip: The sequence is incomplete. The residue is not the terminal residue of the complete protein

tracks.name: unsure
tracks.label: Sequence uncertainty
tracks.tooltip: Regions of a sequence for which the authors are unsure about the sequence assignment

tracks.name: non_std
tracks.label: Non-standard residue
tracks.tooltip: Non-standard amino acids (selenocysteine and pyrrolysine)

tracks.name: helix
tracks.label: Helix
tracks.tooltip: The positions of experimentally determined helical regions

tracks.name: strand
tracks.label: Beta strand
tracks.tooltip: The positions of experimentally determined beta strands

tracks.name: turn
tracks.label: Turn
tracks.tooltip: The positions of experimentally determined hydrogen-bonded turns

tracks.name: coiled
tracks.label: Coiled coil
tracks.tooltip: Coiled coils are built by two or more alpha-helices that wind around each other to form a supercoil

tracks.name: pdbe_cover
tracks.label: PDBe coverage
tracks.tooltip: PDBe 3D structure coverage

tracks.name: topo_dom
tracks.label: Topological domain
tracks.tooltip: Location of non-membrane regions of membrane-spanning proteins

tracks.name: transmem
tracks.label: Transmembrane
tracks.tooltip: Extent of a membrane-spanning region

tracks.name: intramem
tracks.label: Intramembrane
tracks.tooltip: Extent of a region located in a membrane without crossing it

tracks.name: mutagen
tracks.label: Mutagenesis
tracks.tooltip: Site which has been experimentally altered by mutagenesis

tracks.name: variation
tracks.tooltip: Natural variant of the protein, including polymorphisms, variations between strains, isolates or cultivars, disease-associated mutations and RNA editing events
